response.original_title: Jim Reeves - Legends in Concert (The Gentle Man)
response.overview: The Gentle Man' is a feast of music from the ever listenable Jim Reeves the undisputed king of country. The whole collection contains no less than 39 of his best known songs including the million selling 'Bimbo' on DVD and the memorable 'Have 1 Told You Lately That 1 Love You' on CD. Made for television the DVD shows the performer at his best and doing what he did best, entertaining an enthralled audience. An absolute must for all lovers of good country and western music, and of a performer who died at the peak of his singing career.
response.title: Jim Reeves - Legends in Concert (The Gentle Man)
